description.value:
All champions of good alignment follow these tenets. 

  • You must never perform acts anathema to your deity or willingly commit an evil act, such as murder, torture, or the casting of an evil spell.
  • You must never knowingly harm an innocent, or allow immediate harm to one through inaction when you know you could reasonably prevent it. This tenet doesnâ€™t force you to take action against possible harm to innocents at an indefinite time in the future, or to sacrifice your life to protect them.
